title: "Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare Launches Azure Healthcare APIs"
excerpt: "Azure Healthcare APIs enable customers with a platform as a service (PaaS) to ingest, manage, and persist data in the Cloud for Healthcare. Anyone working with health data can use Azure Healthcare APIs to bring disparate sets of PHI together and connect it with tools for machine learning,"
